characters.Name: Missy Dubourde
characters.Description: A creepy little girl, who wants to be a doctor. She cuts up dead things, for fun. Missy then has nightmares about them.
characters.Fears: Dead things coming back to life to haunt her.

characters.Name: Zoe Ingstrom
characters.Description: Zoe has an implied tragic story. Raised in an unhappy home, she uses dolls to express her emotions.

characters.Name: Jenny LeClerc
characters.Hobbies: Reading, Soccer (or Football for us Brits)
characters.Description: A quiet bookworm whose mother disappeared when she was younger. Jenny feels always alone.
characters.Fears: Being trapped in a crowd or lost in the open air.

characters.Name: Heather Granville
characters.Description: Seen as perfect in both her eyes and the eyes of others, when things aren’t perfect she suffers from headaches. She keeps smiling anyway.

characters.Name: Madame Zostra
characters.Description: Also known as Belladina, Madame Zostra is a tarot card reader and tea-leaf reader with her own stay-at-home astrology business.
characters.Fears: Death, especially that of her self.

characters.Name: Vivian Lopez
characters.Description: A small bookshop owner who, when finances become difficult, has thoughts of arson.
characters.Fears: The same as one of her greatest loves – fire.

characters.Name: Darrin “Flash” Williams
characters.Description: Flash is a paranoid runner, who can’t help but shake the feeling that something is chasing him.
characters.Fears: Getting caught by that which is chasing him.

characters.Name: Ox Bellows
characters.Description: A big kid who once had to lash out. Ox is now haunted by his past and what he did that one time.

characters.Name: Brandon Jaspers
characters.Description: A kid who never liked playing with traditional toys, Brandon could swear his old puppet was moving closer to him when he slept.
characters.Fears: Puppets, especially those of the clown variety.

characters.Name: Peter Akimoto
characters.Description: Seriously bullied by his family, Peter liked to hide under his house and look at bugs. He wants to be an entomologist.
characters.Fears: Getting caught somewhere he can’t get out.

characters.Name: Father Rhinehardt
characters.Description: A man who turned to religion to escape persecution, Father Rhinehardt is haunted by the mad whispers of the confessional booth.

characters.Name: Professor Longfellow
characters.Description: An aristocrat by birth, Professor Longfellow now lives with his mother, broke and wondering about her life insurance policy.
